import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { setAmount } from "../redux/actions/salBuyAction" import { useState } from "react" import { saveB } from "../redux/actions/buyAction" import { saveBuyB } from "../axios/buyAxios" export const Sal = () => { const ds = useDispatch() const prod = useSelector(k => k.datareducerS.product) const currnt = useSelector(u => u.datareducercu.currntCuc) const logn=useSelector(s=>s.datareducerL.userName) co const finish = () => { debugger if(logn==" "){ alert("אתה לא מחובר") } const objj = { CusCode: "6776abdf4fd1d88fe1e60927", Date: Date(), all: prod } saveBuyB(objj) .then((x) => { alert("הקניה הושלמה בהצלחה") ds(saveB(x.data)) }) .catch((err)=>console.log(err) ) } return <> {prod.map((x, i) => ( ))}
קוד שם כמות מחיר
{x._id} {x.GameName} {x.Count1} {(x.Count1 * x.Price)}
}
